qmdilib Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
qmdiActionGroupAbstraction layer for QMenu and QToolBar
qmdiActionGroupListAbstraction layer for QMenuBar and a list of toolbars
qmdiClientInterface for menus and toolbars
qmdiHostThe class which contain the menus and toolbars defined by qmdiClient
qmdiServerA default interface for MDI servers
qmdiTabBarHelper class for qmdiTabWidget
qmdiTabWidgetAn advanced tab widget, which is capable of changing menus and toolbars on the fly
qmdiWorkspaceAn advanced work space-widget, which is capable of changing menus and toolbars on the fly
